name: Vampire: Identity Crisis
description:
This is my first publicly published project and my first game jam.

UnZip and play the exe.

Why it's a little so-so: I took 2 weeks of in the middle, so this is what almost 2 weeks of game dev looks like for me.  It's 3d and controls fine. It has about 60% controller support. Some of the menus particularly the later made ui and the very patchwork ending ui don't even try to work with a controller, but most of the game plays a little better on controller so do with that what you will. Characters kept breaking, so I eventually game up and for all the humanoids I broke down and used some default miximo characters (I hate this the models I made/sourced were much better). 

********************************************************************************************
